name: tilt
0:
”Alexa, activate close all shades”
”Alexa, turn on good morning”
”Alexa, run movie time”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: tilt is the simple and easy way to control your home's window coverings. After you successfully install tilt MySmartRollerShades you must also configure a tilt Bridge in your home. Once the tilt Bridge is configured properly in your home you can start using Alexa to trigger scenes that you configure in the tilt iOS or Android app.
